image-to-test-url.title: Image To Test (URL)
image-to-test-url.description: Absolute URL to QCOW2 vm-bootstrap compatible image.

image-to-test-md5sum.title: MD5 checksum of Image To Test.
image-to-test-md5sum.description: MD5 checksum of QCOW2 vm-bootstrap compatible image.

test-relative-directory.title: Relative directory where tests are found.
test-relative-directory.description: The base of this directory is [slapos-package].

script-to-test-url.title: Optional URL of script to test, used for test-type=script-from-url.
script-to-test-url.description:
Optional URL of script to test, which will be injected into the VM.
This parameter will NOT use local git clone of [slapos-package] part, it will test fully provided script.

yml-path-to-test.title: Optional YML path to test from the playbook, used for test-type=cloned-playbook.
yml-path-to-test.description:
Optional YML path to test from the playbook, provided as relative path to playbook root.
This parameter will use local git clone of [slapos-package] part, from which playbook will be constructed.
